description: Linux Server Monitor Dashboard by kmonsoor

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "netdata.disk_util.xvda1.utilization" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

rows.title: Writeback Memory & Memory Used by Kernel

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "netdata.system.ipv4.received" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

rows.title: Total IPv4 Traffic & Total IPv6 Traffic

list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "netdata.system.cpu.system" WITH KEY = "host"

title: Generic Dashboard v.2
